urls.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19): daily data for Scotland
urls.description: Updated Monday to Friday at 2pm to provide the latest data on COVID-19 in Scotland. From 11 April this data will be available on Public Health Scotland's COVID-19 Daily Dashboard.

urls.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) in Scotland | NHS inform
urls.description: Latest coronavirus (COVID-19) guidance from NHS Scotland and the Scottish Government, including protective measures, how to get a test and how to self-isolate

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus

entity.name: COVID-19: Public health updates
entity.description: Information on how to take care of yourself and others from authorities and public officials.

text:
As of 2pm today 126,012 people in Scotland have been tested for #coronavirus

110,391 confirmed negative
15,621 positive

2,415 patients who tested positive have sadly died. 

Latest update ➡️ https://t.co/bZPbrCoQux
Health advice ➡️ https://t.co/l7rqArB6Qu 

#COVIDー19 https://t.co/u25BCakDtl
